pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Projects/SystemSettings" - KDE TechBase
textBeforeTable: These modules are currently displayed in System Settings Y = Yes; N = No; M = Maybe Computer Administration Modules Reimplement administrator mode modules using minimal reader/writer root processes. Hook up to KCMultiWidget etc (DONE) Custom Delegate (DONE) Custom KCategoryDrawer with icon (DONE) SortFilterProxyModel to replace KCMSearch. This should use X-KDE-Weight to set sort order and set a SearchHitRole on the items so that the custom delegate can dim them. (DONE) Use KCategorizedView (DONE) KCModuleModel (DONE) Port to Interview and use KCategorizedView from Dolphin (WIP - Bille ) Use XDG menu structures since these provide arbitrary ordering and extensibility (deferred to 4.1 because what we have in kbuildsyscoca requires that Settings are part of the main K menu, which caused horrible problems in KDE 3 with distros' broken XDG, users removing Settings with kmenuedit. The correct solution is to use XDG algorithms but store the resulting settings menu separately. This could be done in kbuildsycoca but it's too late for thse changes. Using the existing systemsettings metadata for now - Bille) Work plan Commit changing System Settings' menu placement, with comment that it may need changing again. KDE Wiki System Settings that this page replaces
